author: Amanda Stent
fullText: Autumn in Maine is really beautiful. The leaves fall from the trees, exposing the sky and the iconic Maine rocks. People go leaf peeping or apple picking, or sit around a campfire in the evenings.

author: Amanda Stent
fullText: Winter in Maine is also beautiful. The snow kills all the deer ticks. People break out their skis, snow shoes and snowmobiles or go ice fishing. Just be sure to dress warm!
